villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Ballistas.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional 1 Mercury each day.

shipyard.name: Shipyard
shipyard.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

ship.name: Shipyard
ship.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

special1.name: Artifact Merchants
special1.description: For a nominal fee, you can purchase artifacts from the Artifact Merchants.

special2.name: Magic University
special2.description: At the Magic University, you can pay to learn any, or all, of the four schools of magic.

horde1.name: Garden of Life
horde1.description: This structure increases weekly production of Pixies by 10 per week.

horde1Upgr.name: Garden of Life
horde1Upgr.description: This structure increases weekly production of Sprites 10 per week.

grail.name: Aurora Borealias
grail.description: The presence of the Aurora Borealias increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and places all spells in your mage guild.

mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1
mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2
mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3
mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4
mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild5.name: Mage Guild Level 5
mageGuild5.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

dwellingLvl1.name: Magic Lantern
dwellingLvl1.description: The Magic Lantern allows you to recruit Pixies.

dwellingLvl2.name: Altar of Air
dwellingLvl2.description: The Altar of Air allows you to recruit Air Elementals.

dwellingLvl3.name: Altar of Water
dwellingLvl3.description: The Altar of Water allows you to recruit Water Elementals.

dwellingLvl4.name: Altar of Fire
dwellingLvl4.description: The Altar of Fire allows you to recruit Fire Elementals.

dwellingLvl5.name: Altar of Earth
dwellingLvl5.description: The Altar of Earth allows you to recruit Earth Elementals.

dwellingLvl6.name: Altar of Thought
dwellingLvl6.description: The Altar of Thought allows you to recruit Psychic Elementals.

dwellingLvl7.name: Pyre
dwellingLvl7.description: The Pyre allows you to recruit Fire Birds.

dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Magic Lantern
dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Magic Pool allows you to recruit Sprites.

dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Altar of Air
dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Temple of Thunder allows you to recruit Storm Elementals.

dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Altar of Water
dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Temple of Ice allows you to recruit Ice Elementals.

dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Altar of Fire
dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Temple of Energy allows you to recruit Energy Elementals.

dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Altar of Earth
dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Temple of Magma allows you to recruit Magma Elementals.

dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Altar of Thought
dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Temple of Magic allows you to recruit Magic Elementals.

dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Pyre
dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Funeral Pyre allows you to recruit Pheonixes .
